title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
OB: Appending N lines to the StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Open the StyledText component.
2. Enable word wrap mode.
3. Append N lines to the text content.
4. Observe the redraw behavior.
